summary: Iteration 3 (update mode): All tests pass. New features tested: provider/subject filters for requirements, filter options API, combination filters with progress calculation. Backend: 68 tests pass (15 new). Frontend: 55 tests pass (8 new).
seed_data_creation: Test data: Mayo Clinic CME Requirement with provider filter (Mayo Clinic), subject filter (Cardiology), and 1 matching certificate showing 10/20 credits progress.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Session token test_session_1772029888767 remains valid for test user with profession=physician. New tests added for provider/subject filters: TestCertificateFilterOptions (2 tests), TestRequirementsWithFilters (7 tests), TestRequirementsCombinationFilters (6 tests). Frontend tests added for provider/subject filter UI and API integration (8 new tests in new-features.spec.ts).

features_tested.requirement_provider_filter: PASS - Requirements can filter by providers, UI shows provider badges
features_tested.requirement_subject_filter: PASS - Requirements can filter by subjects, UI shows subject badges
features_tested.combination_filters: PASS - Requirements support credit type + provider + subject + year range filters
features_tested.progress_calculation: PASS - Progress only counts certificates matching ALL specified criteria
features_tested.filter_options_api: PASS - GET /api/certificates/filters/options returns unique providers and subjects
features_tested.requirement_card_display: PASS - Cards show 'Required Providers', 'Required Subjects' and filter summary

frontend: Requirements Provider and Subject Filters::add requirement dialog shows provider filter section
Requirements Provider and Subject Filters::add requirement dialog shows subject filter section
Requirements Provider and Subject Filters::certificate filter options API returns providers and subjects
Requirements with Provider/Subject Filters via API::create requirement with provider filter
Requirements with Provider/Subject Filters via API::create requirement with subject filter
Requirements with Provider/Subject Filters via API::create requirement with combination filters
Requirements with Provider/Subject Filters via API::progress calculation filters by all criteria
Requirements Card Display::requirement card shows filter summary when filters applied
